com.jmex.physics
Class PhysicsSpace

java.lang.Object
  com.jmex.physics.PhysicsSpace

public abstract class PhysicsSpace
extends java.lang.Object

PhysicsSpace is the central class of the jME Physics API. PhysicsNodes from the same space can interact with each other. Multiple spaces can be used to model independent physics simulation parts.
PhysicsSpace is used to create PhysicNodes via the createDynamicNode() and createStaticNode() methods.

The application must frequently call update(float) to let the simulation advance. While update is not called the simulation is paused.

Author:
Irrisor

Method Detail

update

public abstract void update(float time)
This method is called by the application to process a simulation timestep. This method also calls the methods from PhysicsUpdateCallback according to their contract.

Parameters:
time - time the simulation should advance

public abstract com.jme.math.Vector3f getDirectionalGravity(com.jme.math.Vector3f store)

getCollisionEventHandler

public com.jme.input.util.SyntheticButton getCollisionEventHandler()
All phyics collisions are reported to this synthetic button to allow the application to react on collisions. The trigger receives the ContactInfo as data element. Thus an action can cast getTriggerData() to ContactInfo to obtain additional information on the collision.

Returns:
a synthetic button that is triggered on each collision event
See Also:
PhysicsNode.getCollisionEventHandler(), PhysicsCollisionGeometry.getCollisionEventHandler()
